Description: Responsibilities-• Perform analytical research and reporting in different total rewards spheres including internal and external equity study, competitive pay practices, and on emerging compensation and benefits trends. Recommend associated policy and/or program changes.• Conduct periodic audits, prepare, and present reports• Assist Rewards Lead to create compensation and benefits plans that are cost-effective and competitive Assists in Job evaluations and classifications.Skills
Skills: Bachelor’s Degree in Bachelor of Science/Math, Business Administration or any other related discipline
